room_title: Escape room "Z51" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Had a great time on Mother's Day escaping one of the tougher rooms at Can You Escape. Jonathan was a very helpful game master! Great time had by the whole family, working together and escaping the interrogation room!

room_title: Escape room "Z51" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: several different 'escape rooms' to try... the hour goes really fast so be organized! i think some of the rooms can have groups of upto 10. enjoy!

room_title: Escape room "Z51" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: I did the new Z51A room and really loved the gameplay! There were a couple of small hitches...nothing serious at all. But it was a blast! The puzzles were very clever and we really got into solving them!!! Definitely worth it!!! Erika was our game master and really made the experience so much more exciting!!!!
